title: Building more than 4 storeys or 16 m in height- The open space dimension prescribed in (a) above shall be increased by at least 0
clause_text: Building more than 4 storeys or 16 m in height- The open space dimension prescribed in (a) above shall be increased by at least 0.25m for every 1 m of height or part thereof, above 4 storeys or 16 m.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Building more than 4 storeys or 16 m in height- The open space dimension prescribed in (a) above shall be increased by at least 0.25m for every 1 m of height or part thereof, above 4 storeys or 16 m.
